properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs
properties.Descript_1:
Marking reservations-around the water source

Vegetative cover improving around the reservation Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings and planting a
